welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lugoff, a charming town known for its historical landmarks and beautiful natural scenery. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Owens Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Owens Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Metropolitan Airport, where most domestic and international flights depart and arrive.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal is used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'CAE_Free_WiFi' and following the prompts.
